column1: text
I am a 33 years old teacher and i hate my job. Do your worst reddit.
25, Dyed my hair for my quarter life crisis. Going to school to become an SLP...but ironically I have a lisp.
27F who currently lives at home, I sell liquor for a living, and my dog is my best friend. Also I think peanut butter is absolutely disgusting.
My 7th grader got made fun of at school today. He didn't want to tell me because he thought I might not understand. Reddit, please help me show him how to take the burn!
Vegan, I cut and dyed my hair after a breakdown and I couldn't find a paper to write it down. End me.
22M, Dutch, IT student, 6'4", nerd, mess me up!
27, had an arranged marriage, and my best friends are paints, roast me?
Just got back from my Union's Labor Day picnic. You know what they didn't have any of? Roast.
20M, single for years, dead mom. No hilds barred. Let's see if y'all can come up with something I haven't heard before.
I’m an exhausted bisexual. End me
21, Living the best of my life. Nothing can put me down
Please roast this Polish man who had a misunderstanding with the barber
Roast me and my small tiny forehead
Y’all know what to do.
19. Writer. English/Philosophy Major. Forever Alone. I've heard it all.
Destroy me
19 year old physics major who got 6 new piercings this summer just for the fun of it:) roast me
a bisexual retard and my goofy ass girlyfriend
I got diagnosed with cancer 3 weeks ago the day after my 30th birthday. Kill me quicker than the cancer will.
Yep!
My friend in need of some confidence booster. 27/not married and love to play overcook. .
He's back for more Roasting...please tell him about his Sunglasses.
My fiancé, Security Officer, Bounty Hunter, Unroastable(?) featuring Ramsay the cat
